message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but $7,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,500. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $8,500. This is my final offer, as I'm happy to go with John's offer if it doesn't work out.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $9,500. I'll give you one more chance to meet me at that price. If not, I'll have to consider other options. What do you say?
